resources.string: Set on the Av Marginal beachfront, Stay Easy Maputo provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool and a terrace overlooking the beach.
Located at Maputo Bay, Afrin Prestige Hotel features a spa, fitness centre and a restaurant. The Tunduru Botanical Gardens is 1 km away. Free WiFi is available.
Offering an outdoor pool and a restaurant, Polana Serena Hotel is located in Maputo. Free WiFi access is available.
Set on the Avenida Marginal beachfront, Stay Easy Maputo provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool and a terrace overlooking the beach.
Radisson Blu Hotel and Residence Maputo is located on the beach side avenue and features an outdoor swimming pool and views of the Indian Ocean.

The National Museum of Art is the main Mozambican reference on the development of national arts.
The restaurant offers a great service, the food is amazing, the environment calm and cosy.
This restaurant serves excellent authentic Indian food. There is indoor and outdoor eating.
Spazio is a very nice place to be with friends. Very good environment, the food is awesome and the drinks are good.
If you after safe European food, this is he place to go. There are several in Maputo.

The Central Market in Mozambique capital of Maputo is a fun place to shop, watch and relax.

If you love textiles, southern Africa culture, are a person who sews or quilts you will love this shop.
